amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $5 million and increases funding for the Defense Health Program by a similar amount for core vision and eye research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $5 million and increase the Other Department of Defense Programs Defense Health Program by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walz (MN) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
